languages.text: "Ваша правда, Ваша Светлость. Что было — того не исправить, но вам предстоит свершить еще немало дел. Так посмотрим же в будущее с надеждой".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша правда, Ваше Сиятельство. Что было — того не исправить, но вам предстоит свершить еще немало дел. Так посмотрим же в будущее с надеждой".

languages.text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."
languages.original_text: "Ваша правда, Ваша Светлость. Что было — того не исправить, но вам предстоит свершить еще немало дел. Так посмотрим же в будущее с надеждой".

traits.locale_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

languages.text: “是啊，大人。已经发生的事情无法改变，但未来依然有伟大的旅途等待着您。因此，请让我们满怀希望，展望未来吧。”
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，大人。已经发生的事情无法改变，但未来依然有伟大的旅途等待着您。因此，请让我们满怀希望，展望未来吧。”

languages.text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No podemos cambiar lo que ya ha sucedido, pero aún le esperan grandes acciones. Así que miremos al futuro con esperanza en el corazón».
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No podemos cambiar lo que ya ha sucedido, pero aún le esperan grandes acciones. Así que miremos al futuro con esperanza en el corazón».

languages.text: 「おっしゃるとおりです、陛下。過去を元に戻すことはできませんが、御身にはまださまざまな偉業を成し遂げていただく機会がございます。希望を胸に、未来を見据えましょう」
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: 「おっしゃるとおりです、陛下。過去を元に戻すことはできませんが、御身にはまださまざまな偉業を成し遂げていただく機会がございます。希望を胸に、未来を見据えましょう」

languages.text: "Ganz recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Geschehenes lässt sich nicht ungeschehen machen, aber vor Euch liegen noch große Taten. Lasst uns also mit hoffnungsfrohen Herzen in die Zukunft blicken."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Geschehenes lässt sich nicht ungeschehen machen, aber vor Euch liegen noch große Taten. Lasst uns also mit hoffnungsfrohen Herzen in die Zukunft blicken."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, Votre Seigneurie. Nous ne pouvons changer le passé, et vous avez encore bien des exploits à accomplir. Nous garderons donc le regard rivé vers l'avenir, le cœur empli d'espoir. »
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, Votre Seigneurie. Nous ne pouvons changer le passé, et vous avez encore bien des exploits à accomplir. Nous garderons donc le regard rivé vers l'avenir, le cœur empli d'espoir. »

languages.text: "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Olan biten değiştirilememekle birlikte gelecekte sizi hâlâ büyük icraatlar bekliyor. Kalplerimizi umutla dolduralım, gözlerimizi geleceğe dikelim."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. What happened cannot be changed, but you still have great deeds ahead of you. So let us look to the future with hope in our hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Olan şeyler değiştirilemez ancak önünüzde sizi hâlâ büyük icraatlar bekliyor. Kalplerimizi umutla dolduralım ve gözlerimizi geleceğe dikelim."
